mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from complain order by idx desc ) a)b where rnum>=#{startNum} and rnum<=#{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from complain order by idx desc where res=0 ) a)b where rnum>=#{startNum} and rnum<=#{endNum}
select count(*) from complain where res = 0
mapper.update: update complain set incharge = #{incharge} , resdate = sysdate, resContent = #{resContent} , res=1 where idx = #{idx}
update member set member_host_grade = member_host_grade-1 where member_idx= #{idx}
